header.title: Tommy Robinson makes racist slur in video and brags about getting ‘drugs anywhere’
header.postText: Far-right activist Tommy Robinson is recorded making a racist slur and brags about getting drugs ‘everywhere he goes’ in a video that has emerged today.', 'The founder of the English Defence League, who has several criminal convictions including for cocaine possession, is seen in the video claiming:', '‘No matter where I’ve gone in the world I score, I’ve gone to f***ing Qatar, to Doha, and scored gear on the sesh while they’re all praying.', '‘Everywhere mate, every city I’ve gone to’.', 'The video, obtained by the Sun, shows Robinson, taking a stroll down the Italian city of Bologna last month.', 'He then appears to make racist comments while asking for a taxi, which he describes as ‘little P*** that drives a car’.', 'In the drunken video recorded on his phone, he also shouts about being the ‘king of the whole Islam race’ and fighting for Israel if war broke out with Palestine.', 'Robinson, whose real name is Stephen Yaxley-Lennon, went on Facebook to respond to the publication of his video, claimed it was shared with friends in a private group.', 'He went on to claim that he was ‘very drunk’ when the video was made and that his comments were ‘banter’.', 'Today he denied he had bought drugs in Qatar, claiming it would have been near impossible for him to do so.', 'Robinson is currently in the middle of a row tearing Ukip apart, after its leader Gerard Batten appointed him as a ‘special adviser’ last year.', 'His role reportedly includes specialising in the areas of ‘rape gangs’ and prison conditions.', 'Former Ukip leader Nigel Farage said the party faced ‘total and utter marginalisation’ for working with the far-right campaigner.', 'Youtube suspended adverts on Robinson’s account last month, saying he breached rules which prohibit the promotion of ‘hatred, intolerance and discrimination’.
